sentence: After  NPR's  last  interview  with  Nathan  Thrall,  Abed  Salama  shared  that  his  wife's  cousin's  son,  Yazan  Shiha,  24,  was  killed  during  an  Israeli  raid  in  the  West  Bank,  according  to  the  Palestinian  health  ministry.
They  were  killed  by  an  Israeli  airstrike  in  Gaza.
